name: Banana Run (StickStudio)
description:
Bananas, bananas, bananas! You're a little monkey in the jungle and have to collect as many coins as you can in this fun skill game. 

Jump from platform to platform, dodge enemies and other obstacles and avoid falling into dangerous gaps. 

If you are hurt, you can recover health by collecting yummy bananas. 

Upgrade helpful power-ups and try to reach a high score!

Play on HTML5GAMES
